article_title: Trump's Proposed Tariffs on Cars and Auto Parts

impacts.impact: Higher prices for imported vehicles and parts due to increased tariffs

supporting_evidence.description: 25% tariff on imported vehicles could increase car prices by $2,000-$7,000 per vehicle

impacts.impact: Potential increase in market share and production due to reduced foreign competition

supporting_evidence.description: Domestic automakers could see 15-20% increase in market share if tariffs are implemented

impacts.impact: Risk of retaliatory tariffs and trade disputes with major trading partners

supporting_evidence.description: EU and China have threatened reciprocal tariffs on US exports worth billions of dollars
